arr: ZigBee Gateway + ZigBee Controller with Power Metering SAC823 +ZigBee Daylight Sensor SDS500
To adjust the brightness of the lamp by the ZigBee daylight sensor and motion sensor automatically

This is a retrofit project. Some areas use daylight sensors to control luminance. Any motion sensor in certain area senses movement, the lamps would be lighted. Greatly reduce energy consumption and extend lamp life.
Transportation, Airport, Train/ bus station, Inventory.
